name: Showcase Plugin
author: Lumia Stream
description: Sample plugin that demonstrates Lumia Stream logging, variables, alerts, and settings.

settings.label: Welcome Message
settings.helperText: Shown when the plugin loads and stored in the sample variable.

settings.label: Favorite Color
settings.helperText: Used when triggering the sample light alert.

settings.label: Trigger Sample Alert
settings.helperText: Automatically fire the sample alert at different times.

actions.label: Log Message
actions.description: Write a formatted message to the Lumia log panel and optionally trigger the sample alert.

actions.label: Update Variable
actions.description: Persist a value into the sample Lumia variable.

actions.label: Trigger Sample Alert
actions.description: Fire the sample alert with optional overrides.

variables.name: last_message
variables.description: Stores the most recent message handled by the plugin.

variables.name: last_alert_color
variables.description: Tracks the color used by the latest sample alert.

variationConditions.description: Trigger this variation based on a percent chance.
